file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 34-24-02-04 - STANDBY ATTITUDE INDICATOR MOUNTING TRAY - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL STANDBY ATTITUDE INDICATOR MOUNTING TRAY - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to remove/install the Standby Attitude Indicator mounting tray. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY STANDBY ATTITUDE INDICATOR ALL 34-24-02-000-801-A MOUNTING TRAY - REMOVAL STANDBY ATTITUDE INDICATOR ALL 34-24-02-400-801-A MOUNTING TRAY - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 34-24-02 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 34-24-02-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. STANDBY ATTITUDE INDICATOR MOUNTING TRAY - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to remove the Standby Attitude Indicator mounting tray. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 34-24-01-000-801-A/400 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Remove the Standby Attitude Indicator (AMM TASK 34-24-01-000-801-A/400). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the screws (2 ) which attach the mounting tray (1) to the glareshield panel cover. (2) Remove the Standby Attitude Indicator mounting tray (1). (3) Remove the shims. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 34-24-02 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Standby Attitude Indicator Mounting Tray - Leveling Figure 402 B A ZONES 223 224 DET. A 2. SCREW (4) DET. B 1. DIGITAL PROTRACTOR 145AMM340370.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 34-24-02 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 34-24-02-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. STANDBY ATTITUDE INDICATOR MOUNTING TRAY - INSTALLATION A. General This task gives the procedure to install the Standby Attitude Indicator mounting tray. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 08-20-00-500-801-A/200 AIRCRAFT LEVELING IN THE PASSENGER CABIN AMM TASK 34-24-01-400-801-A/400 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY To measure the pitch and roll of the mount- GSE 070 Protractor - Digital ing tray E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Make the aircraft level ( AMM TASK 08-20-00-500-801-A/200). (2) Put the Standby Attitude Indicator mounting tray (1) in position. (3) Attach the tray to the glareshield panel cover, but keep the four screws (2) loose. (4) Put the digital protractor on the tray face and add the shims until the protractor shows 75ÃÂ°ÃÂ± 0.5ÃÂ°(Figure 402). (5) Put the digital protractor crosswise on the top of the tray face and add the shims until the protractor shows 0ÃÂ°ÃÂ± 0.5ÃÂ° of tray roll (Figure 402). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 34-24-02 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (6) Tighten the screws (2). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the Standby Attitude Indicator (AMM TASK 34-24-01-400-801-A/400).
